notes.content: Singleton configuration for API access. Contains endpoint URL, authentication headers, and retry policy.
Asynchronous task that fetches data from the API. Returns Promise<Response> which resolves to the HTTP response.
Transforms the raw API response into an array of typed records. Handles data validation and normalization.
Indicates successful completion. All data has been fetched and transformed.
Error state with optional error message. Triggered on API failures or transformation errors.
